articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: FDA: Two more eyedrops brands recalled due to risks - WGN TV Chicago
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — U.S. health officials are alerting consumers about two more recalls of eyedrops due to contamination risks that could lead to vision problems and serious injury. The announcements follow a recall last month of eyedrops made in India that wer…
articles.content:
